Vendor Defaults

When you create a vendor, certain fields in the Vendor profile are populated by the defaults that you set. These fields are listed below:

  • The type of payment terms allowed by vendors.
  • The default payment term.
  • The delivery method (the carrier and delivery option) for shipping items to your location.

These defaults can be changed for individual vendors. Setting such defaults minimizes the data entry required to create a vendor.
